alert.note: Alert for Barrow; Jackson (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 3:10PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Barrow and Jackson Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 310 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was near Pendergrass, or near Jefferson, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Up to 40 mph wind, frequent cloud to ground lightning and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Jefferson, Commerce, Arcade, Nicholson, Hoschton, Pendergrass, Talmo, Bear Creek Reservoir, Peach State Speedway and Apple Valley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
